name: memoizesync
description: Helper for memoizing synchronous functions and methods

scripts.travis: npm test && npm run lint && npm run coverage && <coverage/lcov.info coveralls
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development nyc --reporter lcov --reporter text -- mocha && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html

author: Andreas Lind Petersen <andreas@one.com>
